sources.title: Solaris | SCIENCE FICTION
sources.description:
Version with english subtitles is available on our channel: https://youtu.be/Z8ZhQPaw4rE

La misión Solaris ha establecido una base en un planeta que parece albergar algún tipo de inteligencia, pero los detalles son confusos y muy secretos. Después de la misteriosa desaparición de uno de los tres científicos de la base, el personaje principal es enviado para reemplazarlo. Encuentra la estación en ruinas y a los dos científicos restantes fríos y reservados. Cuando también se encuentra con su esposa, que ha estado muerta durante diez años, comienza a apreciar la naturaleza desconcertante de la inteligencia alienígena...

Calificación IMDb: 8,0

Año de producción: 1972

Director: Andrey Tarkovsky
Escritores: Andrey Tarkovsky, Friedrich Gorenstein
Compositor: Artemyev Eduard
Operador: Yusov Vadim
Diseñador de producción: Romadin Mikhail

Inicio: Elenco: Grinko Nikolai, Dvorzhetsky Vladislav, Banionis Donatas, Solonitsyn Anatoly, Bondarchuk Natalia, Yarvet Yuri, Sargsyan Sos

sources.title: Solaris | SCIENCE FICTION
sources.description:
The Solaris mission has established a base on a planet that appears to host some kind of intelligence, but the details are hazy and very secret. After the mysterious demise of one of the three scientists on the base, the main character is sent out to replace him. He finds the station run-down and the two remaining scientists cold and secretive. When he also encounters his wife who has been dead for ten years, he begins to appreciate the baffling nature of the alien intelligence...

IMDb rating: 8,0

Year of production: 1972

Director: Andrey Tarkovsky
Writers: Andrey Tarkovsky, Friedrich Gorenstein
Composer: Artemyev Eduard
Operator: Yusov Vadim
Production Designer: Romadin Mikhail

Starting: Cast: Grinko Nikolai, Dvorzhetsky Vladislav, Banionis Donatas, Solonitsyn Anatoly, Bondarchuk Natalia, Yarvet Yuri, Sargsyan Sos

#Solaris #Russian_classic #Tarkovsky #FullMoviesWithEngSubs

metadata.Plot: The Solaris mission has established a base on a planet that appears to host some kind of intelligence, but the details are hazy and very secret. After the mysterious demise of one of the three scientists on the base, the main character is sent out to replace him. He finds the station run-down and the two remaining scientists cold and secretive. When he also encounters his wife who has been dead for ten years, he begins to appreciate the baffling nature of the alien intelligence.
metadata.Writer: Stanislaw Lem, Fridrikh Gorenshteyn, Andrei Tarkovsky
metadata.Actors: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet
